topic.title: Better WebHelp
topic.shortdesc: Better Webhelp (BWH) is a frameless html help plugin for the DITA Open Toolkit. It is an open source project available at https://github.com/Jorsek/BetterWebHelp. It is also available as an output scenario for easyDITA.
